Docs.param: of the image to load from the cache.
A which is used to signal when the current request is outdated.
Docs.summary: This method is provided in case a developer would like their own custom caching strategy for . By default it uses the built-in UWP cache provided by and the control itself. This method should return an value of the image specified by the provided uri parameter. A is provided in case the current request is invalidated (e.g. the container is recycled before the original image is loaded). The Toolkit also has an image cache helper which can be used as well: in .
